document_data.name: Summon Nature's Ally IV
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon nature's ally IV''''' was one of the series of ''[[summon nature's ally]]'' spells available to divine spellcasters.
document_data.Effects:
This spell functioned just like all ''summon nature's ally'' spells, which in turn resembled the ''[[summon monster]]'' spells. It could summon a single [[arrowhawk]], [[brown bear]], [[giant crocodile]], [[deinonychus]], [[dire ape]], [[dire boar]], [[dire wolverine]], medium [[elemental]], [[salamander|flamebrother]], [[sea cat]], huge [[shark]], huge [[viper]], [[tiger]], juvenile [[tojanida]], [[unicorn]], or minor [[xorn]].

It could also be used to summon a larger number of monsters from a lower level of a spell in the series.
document_data.Components: The spell required a [[divine focus]] and both [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
